Posts.Content: Welcome, Vanessa, Your thoughts and fears will never be rubbish to us, or any of the NHS people whom you deal with. We've probably had all of them and more. Scans are always scary, and usually turn out fine. Get your thoughts out here. We'll listen and help you all we can. Take care and stay well. Love May X
Posts.Title: I am new to your Forum so sorry if i get this wrong.

Posts.Content: Hi, Jan, I had Taxotere & Herceptin after liver diagnosis. Tumours didn't grow any bigger & are still the same after 2 years. I'm still on Herceptin. Big worry now is brain tumour. Did you have anything like radiotherapy or surgery for that? I've been told mine is treatable, but don't know yet what they will offer. Bit terrified at the moment. You're not alone, although I know it can feel like that at times. See the oncologist asap & let me know how you get on. May X
Posts.Title: Secondary liver
